title: Timeline Schema
description: Configuration for a timeline within the engine

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The URI for the timeline. For mediaplayer type, this is the video/audio source. For animation type, this is a unique identifier.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of timeline provider to use

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the timeline in seconds

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Whether the timeline should loop when it reaches the end

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: CSS selector for the timeline's target element

container.title: Container
container.description: Optional CSS selector for the container element. Defaults to the timeline selector if not specified.

timelineActions.title: Timeline Actions
timelineActions.description: Array of actions to execute at specific timeline positions
